timeline.message:
Deck Description: Handle Newlines Fixes #5188 Previously, a newline was converted into a space, whereas Anki Desktop handles a newline as a newline. We convert newlines to
tags, so context.fromHtml converts them to spaces.

timeline.bodyText: Match more? https://stackoverflow.com/a/13286456 (also note it should be case insensitive - does upstream have an example of this? The recent mathjax PRs show an example of harmonizing regex with AnkiDesktop for replacement purposes - usually we can make it so our pattern almost exactly matches theirs even in style)
